T02D2714:80b-1: aa ra pa tsa na s'a dha nam /
T02D2714:80b-3: aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2714:80b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2714:80b-5: ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar phyag mtshan glegs bam ral gri can //
T02D2714:80b-6: rab mdzes shin gu zhi ba'i gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan //
T02D2714:80b-7: dga' ba rgya cher thar mchog spyan ni padma'i 'dab star yongs //
T02D2714:80b-8: blo gros ngan pa sreg mkhas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2714:80b-9: lo phyed rgyun du bsgom pa mngon sbyor skye bo gang //
T02D2714:80b-10: nges par gnas kun khong du chung 'gyur mchog gi blo //
T02D2714:80b-11: thob 'gyur aa ra pa tsa na ni legs 'grub phyir //
T02D2714:80b-12: 'khor lo rin chen shin tu bsdus pa'i gdams pa brtsam //
T02D2714:80b-13: mnyam zhing gtsang legs yid 'ong dri zhim me tog bkram //
T02D2714:80b-14: dri yi chus btab sa phyogs 'gar ni sngags rig pas //
T02D2714:80b-15: shin tu nyams dga' 'jam pa'i stan la nyer 'dug nas //
T02D2714:80b-16: bde ba'i yid kyis mtshan med byang chub sems bsgom bya //
T02D2714:80b-17: sva bh'a ba shuddha'i sngags brjod cing //
T02D2714:80b-18: dngos po kun nas ma lus stong nyid du //
T02D2714:80b-19: rnam par bsgom bya slar yang bdag gi lus //
T02D2714:80b-20: skad cig nyid la 'od gsal nyid du blta //
T02D2714:80b-21: de nas nam mkhar dbyangs yig dang po las //
T02D2714:80b-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'phro ba sgom //
T02D2714:80b-23: de nas de la dh'i: yig shin tu dkar //
T02D2714:80b-24: de ni 'jam dbyangs dri ma med par bsgom //
T02D2714:81a-1: gtan gyis ni pad steng gnas //
T02D2714:81a-2: chags bcas cung zad 'dzum zhing yid du 'ong //
T02D2714:81a-3: ri bong gis mtshan bye ba'i 'od zer can //
T02D2714:81a-4: rgyan kun gyis brgyan rab gsal bsgom par bya //
T02D2714:81a-5: rang gi snying gar rab 'phro aa yig mchog bsgom ste //
T02D2714:81a-6: 'od kyi dra ba dpag med rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo'i tshul //
T02D2714:81a-7: de steng zla gzugs bsgom bya de las sngags pa yis //
T02D2714:81a-8: ri bong 'dzin 'od ltar dkar 'jam pa'i dbyangs de nyid //
T02D2714:81a-9: de g-yas skra can gzugs mdzes zur mig rgyas pa can //
T02D2714:81a-10: chos de'i nu ma zung ldan rab blta g-yon du ni //
T02D2714:81a-11: rab mdzes rol pa'i 'gying ldan nye ba'i skra can ma //
T02D2714:81a-12: mtha' dag yon tan gter dag tsa dang na las bsgom //
T02D2714:81a-13: rab dkar re pha las byung dri ma med //
T02D2714:81a-14: dra ba can gyi 'od nyid mdun du bsgom //
T02D2714:81a-15: pa yig las skyes 'od zer rang bzhin can //
T02D2714:81a-16: yid 'phrog zla ba'i 'od de'i rgyab tu bsgom //
T02D2714:81a-17: yang na 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge rnams //
T02D2714:81a-18: rgya cher nus mthu ldan pa bsgom par bya //
T02D2714:81a-19: de rnams mi shes ri bo 'joms byed cing //
T02D2714:81a-20: rnyog pa med pa'i ye shes bzang po mdzad //
T02D2714:81a-21: 'og tu 'khor lo myur du 'khor ba las //
T02D2714:81a-22: gti mug mun pa thams cad bcad par bsam //
T02D2714:81a-23: zla gzugs 'od zer chen po'i dra ba can //
T02D2714:81a-24: lhar bcas g-yo ba med pa nyid du blta//
T02D2714:81a-25: ri bong gis mtshan las byung 'od zer gyi //
T02D2714:81a-26: sprin tshogs dpag med phyogs bcur rab 'phros nas //
T02D2714:81a-27: sems can dri med byas nas de bzhin mthar //
T02D2714:81a-28: slar log bdag lus zla ba la zhugs bsam //
T02D2714:81a-29: yid brtan sngags kyi sgo can man ngag bzhin bsgom zhing //
T02D2714:81a-30: sngags kyi dam pa aa ra pa tsa na bzlas na //
T02D2714:81a-31: myur du blo ngan skyon bcom yid 'ong dri med
T02D2714:81a-32: mchog / rgyal ba'i sa dang mchog gi dbang phyug
T02D2714:81a-33: kun kyang thob // mchog gi bla ma dga' ba'i rdo rje dam chos mchog gi mdzod gyur pas //
T02D2714:81a-34: bde bar gshegs tshogs mdun du gang zhin cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2714:81a-35: blo gros bzhag po mi pham bshes gnyen de yis skye bo rnams kyi ni //
T02D2714:81a-36: blo gros 'grub phyir aa ra pa tsa na mchog 'khor lo'i gzhung 'di byas //
T02D2714:81a-37: 'khor lo'i cho ga mchog ni legs bsgrigs las //
T02D2714:81a-38: bsod nams mtha' yas dri med gang thob pa //
T02D2714:81a-39: de yis 'jig rten ma lus sdig spangs shing //
T02D2714:81b-0: 'jam dbyangs bde ba @81b gcig pur gnas gyur cig / aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs //
T02D2714:81b-1: dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mi pham pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2714:81b-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi bh'u ti tsandra dang /
